title: How to stop my 10 year old brother from being computer obsessed - Quora

response.answer_text: Try to get im interested in something else… Something maybe you can do together :) Maybe he plays on the computer because has can interact with people that he doesnt have at home! Maybe play a board game or something outside.. maybe get him a lego set.. get him in a sport… But dont force him, just make it sound really fun and maybe use reverse psychology lol And if that doesnt work. Use your tough love and Turn it off/take it away till he starts having other fun which will bound to happen some time or another after. Just let him know your doing it because you love him and its for his own good lol (As long as you have something else for him to do of course… something he would like! GIVE OPTIONS)
Try to get him to participate in something else that he is interested in. Or if its really an issue then limit his time.
I think that is up to your parents to deal with, to set boundaries. It’s not your place.
